column1: id%%% name%%% description
1%%% Car sharing%%% Short-term car rental with payment by minutes or hours - excluding taxi services and dealership rentals
2%%% Supermarkets%%% Shopping in supermarkets and grocery stores
3%%% Taxi%%% Taxi services (car sharing is not included in this category)
4%%% Music%%% Shopping in stores of music and musical instruments
5%%% Fast food%%% Shopping at fast food restaurants

6%%% Transport%%% Payment for urban and suburban transport. Parking fees garages and toll roads. Payment in the Transport section in the Tinkoff application and on the tinkoff.ru website. Buying special equipment and leasing a car - not including car rental
7%%% Pharmacies%%% Shopping in pharmacies
8%%% Cinema%%% Shopping in cinemas and movie shops
9%%% Books%%% Shopping at bookstores and newsagents
10%%% Entertainment%%% Payment for entertainment (for example in video game stores
column3: payment in the category Theaters and Concerts on tinkoff.ru and in the mobile application

column1: 11%%% The beauty%%% Shopping in massage and beauty salons
12%%% Education%%% Payment in public and private schools
column3: as well as fees for specialized training: busines

column1: 13%%% Clothes and Shoes%%% Shopping in clothing and footwear stores
14%%% Restaurants%%% Paying bills in bars
15%%% Fuel%%% Buying gas and petrol at gas stations
16%%% Animals%%% Shopping at pet stores
17%%% Home and renovation%%% Shopping in furniture
18%%% Sports goods%%% Shopping at sporting goods stores
19%%% Souvenirs%%% Shopping in souvenir shops: postcards
20%%% Photo and video%%% Shopping in photo and video equipment stores
21%%% Flowers%%% Shopping in flower shops and floristic salons
22%%% Rent a Car%%% Payment for car rental in dealerships (car sharing is not included in this category)
23%%% Car services%%% Purchase of auto parts
column2: services in car services and car washes

column1: 24%%% Flights%%% Payment for air tickets
25%%% Duty free%%% Shopping in duty-free shops
26%%% Railway tickets%%% Paying for train tickets
27%%% Art%%% Shopping in gallerie
